name: UIScribbleInteraction
desc: An interaction for customizing the behavior of Scribble on text input views, or for suppressing it entirely in specific cases.

items.name: init(delegate: UIScribbleInteractionDelegate)
items.desc: Creates a Scribble interaction that allows customizing the behavior of Scribble on text input views with the delegate you provide.

items.name: var delegate: UIScribbleInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate for this interaction and responds to Scribble events for text input views.

items.name: var isHandlingWriting: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is actively writing in a text view.

items.name: class var isPencilInputExpected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the user is likely to use Apple Pencil and handwriting instead of the keyboard to enter text.
